description:
Droid Trivia is fun for everyone! Challenge your friends or family to over 800 questions spread over 15 categories! Go head-to-head in local couch multiplayer or play against the AI. Choose to Play 4 or 8 rounds or just the individual rounds you like. Droid Trivia includes 4 round types: True or False, Multiple Choice, Memory & Picture-based questions to mix it up! Thereâ€™s something for every trivia fan! 

*4 round types: True or False, Multiple Choice, Memory & Picture-based questions to mix it up! 
* Choose to Play 4 or 8 rounds or just the individual rounds you like.
 *Customizable game settings, including the ability to set the number of rounds, questions per round, time to answer, toggle achievements and new lifelines, select AI players, and more
name: Droid Trivia
